Instruction: Stir yeast into warm water in a large bowl, allowing it to sit for a few minutes until it dissolves. Add sugar, salt, margarine, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, oregano, and 3 cups of flour. Mix at low speed for 2 minutes. Then incorporate the remaining flour. Cover the bowl with wax paper and a kitchen towel and let it rise in a warm place for 45 minutes or until doubled in size.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a round, 2-quart casserole dish. Set it aside.
Stir batter for 30 seconds, then transfer it into the prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of Parmesan cheese on top.
Bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) for 55 minutes.
